mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member M INNER JOIN album A on M.id = A.id INNER JOIN audioboard B on A.album_idx = B.album_idx WHERE B.audio_idx = #{audio_idx}
SELECT * FROM m_comment WHERE audio_idx=#{audio_idx} ORDER BY comment_idx ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_comment (comment_idx, audio_idx, id, contents, regidate) VALUES (seq_comment.nextval,#{audio_idx},#{id},#{contents},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM audioboard WHERE audio_idx=#{audio_idx} AND id=#{id}
